name: tm76
effect: Teaches Stealth Rock to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Struggle Bug to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Stealth Rock)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user flies up into the sky and then strikes its target on the next turn.
